entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
